overview: Hidden in the shadows of the centuries is a threat that is about to be unleashed - An old secret society, striving to dictate the fate of this world forever, is preparing to...dictate the fate of this world forever.  Driven by the greed for power, the minions of evil make their way through blood.  Will the Guardians of Five Magical Stones Avert the Apocalypse?
title: S.A.P.
